original_text: So send some men to Joppa to fetch a man who is called Simon Peter. He is staying there at the house of Simon the tanner. His house is near the sea.”
korean_text: 사람을 욥바에 보내어 베드로라 하는 시몬을 청하라 그가 바닷가 무두장이 시몬의 집에 유숙하느니라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: So send some men to Joppa
to fetch a man who is called Simon Peter
sentences.korean_translation: 시몬 베드로라고 불리는 사람을 데려오기 위해

sentences.original_text: at the house of Simon the tanner
His house is near the sea
